title: Fix Internet Identity canister stopped error on login

requirements.text: Fix the canister stopped error (IC0408) occurring during Internet Identity login that shows 'The replica returned a rejection error: Reject code: 5, Reject text: Canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai is stopped'

quotes: Reject text: Canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai is stopped

acceptanceCriteria: Login completes successfully without canister stopped errors
The setupAdmin function executes without rejection
Users can authenticate and access the application
No IC0408 error codes appear in the console

requirements.text: Ensure the backend canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai is running and properly configured to accept requests from the Internet Identity authentication flow
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister responds to health checks
Canister accepts authenticated requests from Internet Identity
setupAdmin endpoint is accessible and functional

constraints: Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication implementation in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts
Preserve existing retry logic and error handling in Login.tsx
nonGoals: Changing the authentication provider from Internet Identity
Modifying the frontend UI or styling of the login page
